import React, { useState, Fragment } from 'react'; import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; import { connect } from 'react-redux'; import { createProfile } from '../../actions/profile'; import { Link, withRouter } from 'react-router-dom'; import auth from '../../reducers/auth'; const CreateProfile = ({createProfile}) => { const [ formData, setFormData ] = useState({ company: '', website: '', location: '', status: '', skills: '', githubusername: '', bio: '', twitter: '', facebook: '', linkedin: '', youtube: '', instagram: '' }); const onChange = (e) => setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); onsubmit() const [ displaySocialInputs, toggleSocialInputs ] = useState(false); const { status, company, website, location, skills, githubusername, bio, twitter, facebook, linkedin, youtube, instagram } = formData; return (
